company:collect_payees:collect_payments:: Reduce late payments by offering your customers a simpler, more preferred way to pay your business by credit card.
Get started with credit card payments without any tech integrations.
Your prepaid invoices are less than HKD 54,000. There are no limits on postpaid invoices.
We offer payment collection via Credit Card
Collect card payments from your customers quickly and easily, with our no-code solution
company:collect_payees:form:average_invo: This will help us cater to your business needs better.
company:collect_payees:form:expected_vol: All mediums refer to all payment methods such as cash, cheque, bank transfer and credit cards. This helps us understand your payment collection needs better.
company:collect_payees:form:verify_compa: To help us verify your company’s bank details, upload your company’s %{bank_statement_link} (.png, .jpg or .pdf).
company:collect_payees:form_collect:coll: To verify your company’s details, please provide a copy of your Business Registration Certificate issued by IRD.
To verify your company’s details, please provide a copy of your NAR1 form issued by Companies Registry
For verification purposes, we are able to accept only colour images/ scans of your identity documents.
company:collect_payees:passport_details:: Passport/HKID of authorized members (of the individuals authorised to manage the CardUp account, as per Appendix 2 of the Addendum)
Passport/HKID (of the person signing the Addendum)
To verify your company's details, a copy of your company's Business Registration Certificate is required.
To verify your company's details, a copy of your company's NAR1 Form is required.
To facilitate the setup of your company's CardUp account, a copy of the passport or HKID of the person signing the Addendum is required.
To facilitate the setup of your company's CardUp account, a copy of the passports or HKIDs of the Authorized Members is required.
company:collect_payees:payment_method_fo: When customer pays via Credit Card
I agree to use CardUp Collect to accept payments from customers only in exchange for goods or services provided by my business
I acknowledge that payments cannot be refunded to my customers directly by CardUp
Payment via credit card will reach you within 3 business days.
